ConditionalsÂ¶

Using conditionals in PromptScript.

Conditionals in PromptScript function the same as in python:

1number = 8
2guess = 5
3
4if guess > number:
5    show "your guess is too high."
6elif guess < number:
7    show "your guess is too low."
8else:
9    show "you guessed correctly!"
